title: Love Island's Maura Higgins and Curtis Pritchard enjoy PDA-fest before cosy cab home
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Maura Higgins and Curtis Pritchard indulged in some serious PDA at a glitzy event.

The Love Island couple put on the incredibly amorous display once again at the star-studded Specsavers Spectacle Wearer of the Year awards hosted in London on Monday.

Oblivious to the star-studded crowd, the happy pair stuck their tongues out at each other while they got very cosy at the swanky venue 8 Northumberland Avenue.

A smitten Maura puckered up for a kiss with her beau while he captured the sweet moment on camera with a selfie.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Maura oozed sensuality as she brightened up her look with a red lip and she slipped her figure into a plunging white blazer suit.

Dressed for the glamorous Specsavers' event, the Irish beauty made a statement with her ultra chic glasses.

They looked even closer when they enjoyed a cosy ride home in a cab after the event.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Maura and Curtis proved they were still incredibly loved-up, even though they aren't ready to move in just yet.

The professional dancer divulged the hot couple aren't been ready to take their relationship to the next level.

Curtis told The Mirror: "We haven't had a conversation about moving in together or anything like that yet. It's good to take things slow.

"You wouldn't usually move in together so soon – I've only known her for two and a half months!"

Aside from their blossoming romance, the pair have been focusing on their individual careers.

Maura was seen posing up a storm for a Christmas-themed photo shoot with Ann Summers.
description: Love Island's Maura and Curtis packed on the PDA when they attended a star-studded event in London
